name: Lord of the Flies - Submission for GameDev Insiders Jam #2
name_original: Lord of the Flies - Submission for GameDev Insiders Jam #2
description:
Created in ~48 hours for the GameDev Insiders Jam #2

Protect the king! 

As lord of the flies, you must rally your fellow insects to accompany you through hazardous airways - the more peons under your control, the more bodies between you and the mesmerizing death lights!

Use WASD or arrow keys to fly around the screen. Collect other flies for your swarm, and avoid electric fly traps.
